description: Try our easy to follow Smokin' Chicken Skewers With Creamed Corn recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Skewer & kebab,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Tomato,Chicken,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Smokin' Chicken Skewers With Creamed Corn Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tbs thyme leaves, plus extra thyme sprigs to garnish
80g light cream cheese, at room temperature
750g chicken thigh fillets, cut into 3cm pieces

recipeInstructions.text: Combine buttermilk, seasoning, herbs, paprika and lime juice in a bowl. Add chicken and stir to coat. Cover and refrigerate for 30 minutes.

Meanwhile, preheat oven to 200Â°C. Line a baking tray with baking paper. Whisk cream cheese and milk in a bowl. Stir in corn and thyme, and season. Transfer to a 6-cup capacity baking dish and sprinkle over tasty cheese. Bake for 25-30 minutes or until corn is soft and cheese is golden.

Thread chicken onto 6 metal or soaked bamboo skewers. Heat a frying pan over medium heat. Spray with oil and cook skewers, in batches, for 3 minutes on each side or until golden. Transfer to tray. Add tomatoes and bake for 10 minutes or until cooked through. Garnish skewers with extra thyme and serve with corn, tomatoes and wraps.
